hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT TAX_MASTER_ID, GROSS, NON_RESIDENT, RESIDENT, TAX_YEAR, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, QUARTER_CODE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID, WAGE_TYPE FROM SYS_TAX_MASTER WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy}

INSERT INTO SYS_TAX_MASTER ( TAX_MASTER_ID, GROSS, NON_RESIDENT, RESIDENT, TAX_YEAR, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, QUARTER_CODE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID, WAGE_TYPE ) VALUES ( ${TAX_MASTER_ID}, ${GROSS}, ${NON_RESIDENT}, ${RESIDENT}, ${TAX_YEAR}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${QUARTER_CODE}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID}, ${WAGE_TYPE} )

UPDATE SYS_TAX_MASTER SET GROSS = ${GROSS}, NON_RESIDENT = ${NON_RESIDENT}, RESIDENT = ${RESIDENT}, TAX_YEAR = ${TAX_YEAR}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, QUARTER_CODE = ${QUARTER_CODE}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID}, WAGE_TYPE = ${WAGE_TYPE} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
